mapper.select: select r.seat_class, r.charge_pay, rs.seat_id, r.flight_id, st.seat_number, f.departure_airport, f.arrival_airport, f.departure_time, f.arrival_time, f.flight_duration, f.airplane_id, f.flight_name from reservations r join reservation_seats rs on r.reservation_id = rs.reservation_id join seattemplate st on rs.seat_id = st.seat_id join flights f on r.flight_id = f.flight_id where r.pnr=#{pnr} and r.sung=#{sung} and r.name=#{name} and DATE(f.departure_time)=#{date}

SELECT a1.airport_name AS departure_airport_name, a1.city AS departure_city, a2.airport_name AS arrival_airport_name, a2.city AS arrival_city FROM airports a1 JOIN flights f ON f.departure_airport = a1.airport_code JOIN airports a2 ON f.arrival_airport = a2.airport_code WHERE f.flight_id = #{flight_id}
